name: Value Recovery
description: Market stress regime with negative equity returns but strong value, quality, and small-cap outperformance. Characterized by style rotation away from growth toward defensive factors.

name: Bear Market Transition
description: Severe market decline regime with negative equity returns but strong performance in conservative investment factors. Flight to quality and value strategies dominate.

name: Growth Bull Market
description: Strong equity bull market regime with positive market returns but underperformance of value, small-cap, and conservative factors. Growth and large-cap momentum dominate.
